    • MyCanvasWindow

      protected MyCanvasWindow​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String gameWorldPath)
      Initializes a CanvasWindow object.
      Parameters:
      title - Window title
      gameWorldPath - the name of the GameWorld jar, in the same directory as the project jar or in the project files, that should be loaded in. If no jar is found, it shall look for a package name inside the project instead

    • paint

      public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Description copied from class: CanvasWindow
      Called to allow you to paint on the canvas. You should not use the Graphics object after you return from this method.
      Overrides:
      paint in class CanvasWindow
      Parameters:
      g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.
